title: White Hart Lane
summary: White Hart Lane was a football stadium in Tottenham, North London and the home of Tottenham Hotspur Football Club from 1899 to 2017. Its capacity varied over the years; when changed to all-seater it had a capacity of 36,284 before demolition.[3] The stadium was fully demolished after the end of the 2016â€“17 season and was replaced by Tottenham Hotspur Stadium as the club's home ground.[4]
